name: Masala Grille
text:
Appetiser Menu
Indian Appetisers
Chicken 65 Boneless pieces of chicken breast marinated with spices, battered and deep fried in rice flour. 17.95 (GF)*

Pakoras Vegetarian fritters made with shredded potatoes, onion, carrot and deep-fried in chickpea flour batter. 10.95 (12 pcs) (V) (GF)*

Paneer Pakoras Indian-style cheese marinated in mint and deep-fried with chickpea flour batter. 14.95 (G)

Fish Pakora Basa fish deep-fried in a chickpea flour batter, served with our mint coriander chutney. 17.95 (GF)*

Keema Samosas Deep-fried pastries stuffed with minced chicken and peas. 10.95 (2 pcs) (G)

Vegetarian Samosas Deep-fried pastries stuffed with potatoes and peas. 10.95 (2 pcs) (G)

Paneer Tikka Samosas Deep-fried pastries stuffed with savoury Indian-style cheese. 12.95 (2 pcs) (G)

Samosa Chana Chaat Pieces of samosa topped with chickpeas, yoghurt and Indian chutneys. For vegan option, ask for no yoghurt. 10.95 (2 pcs) (G)

Aloo Tikki Chaat Potato patties stuffed with seasoned paneer and peas, topped with yoghurt and Indian chutney. 9.95 (2 pcs) (G)

Hara Bhara Kabab Indian patties made of spinach, potatoes, lentils & Indian-style cheese. 14.95 (5 pcs) (GF)*

Dahi Kebabs Browned patties with a lightly spiced yoghurt and paneer filling. 12.95 (5 pcs) (G)

Pappadam Roasted lentil crackers. 5.95 (5 pcs) (V) (GF)

Masala Pappadam Roasted lentil crackers, served with a side of katchumbar salad. 8.95 (5 pcs) (V) (GF)

Veg Manchurian Deep-fried vegetable balls made with finely chopped cabbage, carrots, and other vegetables, all tossed in a flavourful, sweet, and spicy sauce. 15.95 (V) (GF)*

Goli Kebabs Spiced cheese & corn balls in a crispy breading. 12.95 (12 pcs) (G)

Masala Potato Wedges Deep-fried potato wedges seasoned with Indian spices. 10.95 (V) (GF)*

Thai Appetisers
Vegetarian Spring Rolls Seasoned vegetables wrapped in a crispy wrap & served with a sweet Thai chilli sauce. 10.95 (8 pcs) (V)(G)

Chicken Satay Skewers of sliced chicken breast, marinated in exotic herbs & cooked on a piece of coal. 16.95 (4 pcs)

Tiger Prawns with Tamarind Marinated batter fried tiger prawns served with a tangy tamarind dipping sauce. 18.95 (G)

Coconut Shrimp Tender, sweet & crispy coconut-encrusted shrimp and served with a sweet Thai chilli sauce. 17.95 (G)

Tandoori Appetisers
Jheenga Adraki Mouthwatering spicy tiger-prawns flavoured with ginger & roasted in our clay oven. Served with coriander & mint chutney. 18.95 (GF)*

Doodhiya Murgh Tikka Boneless chicken breast cubes marinated in a rich cream sauce, flavoured with cardamom & roasted in our clay oven. Served with coriander & mint chutney. 17.95 (GF)*

Tandoori Murgh Tikka Boneless chicken breast cubes marinated with traditional tandoori spices & roasted in our clay oven. Served with coriander & mint chutney. 16.95 (GF)*

Paneer Tikka Indian-style cheese, bellpeppers and onions marinated with traditional tandoori spices & roasted in our clay oven. Served with coriander & mint chutney. 17.95 (GF)*

Indian Street Food
Pav Bhaji A mashed mixture of potatoes, onion, tomatoes & peas cooked in a tamarind-based pao pad sauce, topped with nuts. 14.95 (G)

Pani Puri Deep-fried hollow shells filled with spicy mixture of potatoes, chickpeas & mint-coriander chutney. Served with sweet, spicy & tangy flavoured water. 9.95 (V) (G)

Dahi Puri Deep-fried hollow shells filled with potatoes, chickpeas. Topped with sweet and tangy tamarind & mint-coriander chutney, yoghurt & sev. (Fried chickpea flour noodles) 10.95 (G)

Vada Pav A deep-fried potato fritters topped with chutneys and served in a toasted buttered bun. (2pcs) 9.95 (G)

Bhel Puri A savoury blend of puffed rice, crunchy puri, nuts, onions, tomatoes, coriander & tamarind chutney. 8.95 (V) (GF)

Vegetable Dishes
Aloo Gobhi Potatoes & cauliflower tossed with onion, tomato & fresh ginger gravy. 17.95 (V) (GF)

Gobhi Taka Tin Cauliflower tossed with bell peppers in a tomato onion base gravy. 17.95 (V) (GF)

Bhindi Do Pyaza Okra and onions cooked in a tomato onion gravy. 17.95 (GF)* (V)

Chana Masala Chickpeas in a tomato onion gravy. 15.95 (GF) (V)

Dal Lentils tempered with Indian spices - varies daily. 15.95 (V) (GF)

Dal Makhani Lentils seasoned with butter, cream, and a blend of aromatic spices. 16.95 (GF)

Khumb Jhalfrezi Mushrooms tossed with bell peppers & onions in a tomato onion base gravy. 17.95 (GF)* (V)

Mixed Vegetable Neelgiri Vegetables cooked with spinach and mint. 17.95 (GF) (V)

Mixed Vegetable Coconut Masala Assorted vegetables cooked in a coconut & tomato onion gravy. 17.95 (GF) (V)

Mixed Vegetable Makhani Assorted vegetables cooked in a creamy tomato base sauce. 17.95 (GF)

Mixed Vegetable Makhan Masala For those who are looking more savoury version of mixed vegetable makhani. 17.95 (GF)

Aloo Palak Potatoes cooked with spinach. 17.95 (V) (GF)*

Subz Miloni Mixed vegetables cooked in a mild creamy cashew nut base sauce. 17.95 (GF)

Thai Vegetable Curry (Red or Green) Mixed vegetables cooked in a flavourful coconut & kaffir lime base curry. 18.95 (V) (GF)

Cauliflower & Beans with Cashew Nut Cooked in a green Thai coconut milk base curry. 18.95 (V) (GF)

Sweet & Sour Vegetables with Cashew Nut Assorted vegetables and cashew nuts cooked in a sweet & spicy Thai style sauce. 17.95 (V) (GF)

Mixed Vegetables with Quick Fried Basil Cooked in oyster and soya sauce. 17.95 (G)

Paneer Dishes
Palak Makai Paneer Spinach, corn & Indian-style cheese cooked in an onion tomato gravy. 19.95 (GF)*

Palak Paneer Spinach & Indian-style cheese cooked in an onion tomato gravy. 19.95 (GF)*

Mattar Paneer Indian-style cheese and peas cooked in a mild creamy tomato cashew nut sauce. 19.95 (GF)*

Paneer Achari Indian-style cheese cooked in a tomato, yoghurt & cashew nut base sauce flavoured with Indian pickle spices. 19.95 (GF)*

Paneer Makhani Indian-style cheese cooked in a creamy tomato based sauce. Chef recommended! 19.95 (GF)

Paneer Makhan Masala For those who are looking for more savoury version of paneer makhani. 19.95 (GF)

Paneer Tikka Masala Indian-style cheese cooked in a creamy tomato onion cashew nut sauce. 19.95 (GF)*

Paneer Goan Curry Indian-style cheese cooked in a savoury tomato onion coconut gravy. 19.95 (GF)*

Kahrai Paneer Indian-style cheese cooked with bell peppers & onions in tomato onion based gravy. 19.95 (GF)*

Chilli Paneer Fried pieces of Indian-style cheese tossed with bell peppers, onions in a spicy & tangy tomato base sauce. 19.95 (G)

Rice & Noodle Dishes
Biryani Long grain basmati rice cooked with aromatic spices & as a base item of your choice. Vegetable 18.95 * Paneer 20.95 * Chicken 21.95 * Beef 22.95 * Lamb 25.95 (GF). Served with a side of Raita.

Basmati Rice Small 3.50 * Large 6.50 (V) (GF)

Pad Thai Chicken, shrimp and vegetables cooked with rice noodles in a tamarind-base pad thai sauce, topped with nuts. 20.95 (GF)

Hakka Noodles A spicy Indo-Chinese style stir-fry noodle dish made with chicken, shrimp, bell peppers, onions & carrots. 20.95 (G)

Naan & Sides
Naan Indian flatbread cooked in the tandoor oven.

Plain Naan 4.25 (V) (G)

Garlic Naan 4.75 (G)*

Raita Naan 5.00 (G)

Garlic Raita Naan with butter 5.50 (G)

Garlic Yoghurt blended with Indian spices. 3.50 (GF)

Mixed Vegetable Raita Raita mixed with cucumber, tomato & onions. 5.95 (GF)

Lachcha Salad Sliced onions dressed with lemon juice & Indian spices. 3.95 (V) (GF)

Achaar Indian-style spicy pickles. 2.50 (V) (GF)

Salads
Katchumbar Salad An Indian-style salad made with diced cucumber, onion & tomatoes with a tangy lemon spiced dressing. 7.95 (V) (GF)

Garden Salad A bed of lettuce topped with cucumber, tomato & onions. Served with a balsamic vinaigrette. 7.95 (V) (GF)

Chickpea Salad (Chana Chaat) Indian-style chickpea salad with diced potato, cucumber & onion in a tangy lemon spiced dressing. 9.95 (V) (GF)

À La Carte Menu
All entrées are served with a portion of rice.

(V) - Vegan, (G) - Contains Gluten, (GF)* - Gluten free, however the item or an ingredient may have been deep fried or grilled in the same equipment as other gluten products.

Chicken Dishes
Butter Chicken All time favourite boneless chicken cooked in a buttery and creamy tomato based sauce. 20.95 (GF)

Murgh Makhan Masala For those who are looking for a savoury version of Butter Chicken. Chef recommended! 20.95 (GF)

Murgh Korma Boneless chicken cooked in a rich and creamy cashew nut sauce with a cardamom finish. 20.95 (GF)

Murgh Falgooni Boneless chicken simmered in a rich cashew nut sauce & tempered with garlic. 20.95 (GF)

Hyderabadi Dum Ka Murgh Boneless chicken breasts cooked in a cashew nut cream base sauce, flavoured with coconut. Chef favourite! 20.95 (GF)

Kahrai Murgh Marinated chicken tossed with bell peppers in a tomato onion sauce. 20.95 (GF)

Methi Murgh Chicken cooked in a tomato,onion gravy finished with fenugreek. 20.95 (GF)

Dhaba Chicken Curry Indian roadside chicken dish made with potatoes & cooked in a traditional tomato onion based gravy, finished with ginger. 19.95 (GF)*

Murgh Vindaloo Boneless chicken cooked in a chilli garlic tomato onion gravy. 20.95 (GF)

Murgh Tikka Masala Tandoor-roasted boneless chicken cooked in a creamy tomato onion cashew nut based sauce. 21.95 (GF)*

Chicken Goan Curry Boneless chicken cooked in a savoury tomato onion coconut gravy. 20.95 (GF)

Hakka Chilli Chicken Fried chicken pieces tossed with bell peppers, onions in a spicy & tangy tomato base sauce. 20.95 (G)

Thai Chicken Curry (Red or Green) Chicken cooked in a flavourful coconut and kaffir lime based curry. 21.95 (GF)

Stir-fry Chicken with Cashew nut Chicken and cashew nut cooked in oyster and soya sauce. 20.95 (G)

Beef Dishes
Beef Vindaloo Boneless beef cooked in a chilli garlic tomato onion base gravy. 21.95 (GF)

Beef Korma Boneless beef cooked in a creamy cashew nut tomato onion gravy, seasoned with cardamom. 21.95 (GF)

Kahrai Beef Boneless beef, onion & bell peppers cooked in a tomato onion base gravy with a hot blend of spices. 21.95 (GF)

Aloo Gosht An Indian-style beef and potato curry made in a classic tomato onion gravy, seasoned with spices. 20.95 (GF)*

Lamb Dishes
Lamb Vindaloo Halal boneless lamb cooked in a chilli garlic tomato onion base gravy. 24.95 (GF)

Lamb Korma Halal boneless lamb cooked in a creamy cashew nut tomato onion sauce, finished with cardamom. 24.95 (GF)

Lamb Roganjosh Halal boneless lamb slow cooked in a blend of fragrant traditional Indian spices. 24.95 (GF)

Kahrai Lamb Halal boneless lamb, onion & bell peppers cooked in a tomato onion base gravy with a hot blend of spices. 24.95 (GF)

Seafood Dishes
Fish Curry Chickpea flour battered basa fish cooked in a tomato onion gravy. 20.95 (GF)*

Fish Jalfrezi Chickpea flour battered basa fish cooked with bell peppers & onions in a tomato onion gravy. 20.95 (GF)*

Prawn Goan Curry Tiger prawns/basa fish cooked in a savoury tomato onion coconut gravy. 21.95 (GF)

Shrimp Vindaloo Shrimp cooked in a chilli garlic tomato onion gravy. 21.95 (GF)

Thai Shrimp Curry (Red or Green) Shrimp cooked in a flavourful coconut and kaffir lime based curry. 22.95 (GF)

Stir-fry Prawns with Spring Onion & Mushrooms Cooked with oyster and soya sauce. 21.95 (G)

Masala Grille Buffet
Enjoy a family-style meal prepared by our chef featuring beef, chicken, paneer, vegetables, and lentil dishes, rice, pakoras and naan. 25.95
